title: File:The 5th Dimension - The Age of Aquarius
content:

[[size smaller]]已是最大尺寸[[/size]]
[[[http://scpsandboxcn.wikidot.com/local--files/echoaphaniptera/SCP-CN-1000-1.jpg|The_5th_Dimension_-_The_Age_of_Aquarius.jpg]]] (600 × 600 pixels, 文件大小: 25 KB, 文件类型: image/jpeg)
[[/=]]
----
**文件编号：**File-CN:19680319/SCP-CN-1050-AA1

**机密级：**--CN-1050/0-- CN-1050/5

**文件类型：**图像/音频/视频/图像转录文字/音频转录文字

**描述：**SCP-CN-1050-AA1是一组文件合集。包含2张图片；13段音频（总时长42分9秒）。所有的音频均采集于美国音乐组合 The 5th Dimension于1969年发行的专辑《The Age of Aquarius》。《The Age of Aquarius》是一张风格以蓝调布鲁斯、灵歌以及阳光流行乐为主的专辑，由Bones Howe制作，Soul City发行。

该张专辑在美国公告牌专辑两百强榜单中取得了第二名的成绩，而专辑的主打单曲Medley: Aquarius/Let the Sunshine In则在热门百强榜中夺冠六周。

专辑曲目：
第一面
# "Medley: Aquarius/Let the Sunshine In (The Flesh Failures)"– 4:51
# "Blowing Away" – 2:32
# "Skinny Man" – 2:51
# "Wedding Bell Blues" – 2:44
# "Don'tcha Hear Me Callin' to Ya" – 3:56
# "The Hideaway" – 2:45

第二面
# "Workin' On a Groovy Thing" – 3:10
# "Let It Be Me" – 3:54
# "Sunshine of Your Love" – 3:18
# "The Winds of Heaven" – 3:14
# "Those Were the Days" – 3:03
# "Let the Sunshine In (Reprise)" – 1:29"
----

**附录CN-1050-AA1-A1 《The Age of Aquarius》音频节选及其歌词（中英文对照）**
[[collapsible show="+ 《Aquarius/Let the Sunshine In》" hide="-《Aquarius/Let the Sunshine In》"]]
**《Aquarius》部分**
[[html]]
<iframe src="https://www.opendrive.com/player/MTlfMTgxNDU0ODBfZkhJWVU" height="25" width="297" style="border:0" scrolling="no" frameborder="0" allowtransparency="true"></iframe>
[[/html]]
> When the moon is in the seventh house
> 当月亮处于第七宫中
> And Jupiter aligns with Mars
> 木星与火星并成一线
> The peace will guide the planets
> 和平将指引行星
> And love will steer the stars
> 而爱将引领群星
> This is the dawning of the age of Aquarius
> 这就是宝瓶座时代的曙光
> Age of Aquarius
> 宝瓶座时代
> Aquarius, Aquarius
> 宝瓶座，宝瓶座
> Harmony and understanding, sympathy and trust abounding
> 和谐与理解，同情与信任
> No more false hoods or derisions, golden living dreams of visions
> 再无虚伪与嘲讽，美好生活之梦的畅想
> Mystic crystal revelations, and the mind's true liberations
> 神秘水晶启示，心灵得以真正解放

**《Let the Sunshine In》部分**
[[html]]
<iframe src="https://www.opendrive.com/player/MTlfMTgxNDU0ODFfcXNRTVY" height="25" width="297" style="border:0" scrolling="no" frameborder="0" allowtransparency="true"></iframe>
[[/html]]
> Let the sunshine
> 让阳光
> Let the sunshine in
> 让阳光照进来
> The sunshine in
> 让阳光照进来
> 
> Let the sunshine (oh let it shine!)
> 让阳光（哦，让它闪耀！）
> Let the sunshine in (come on)
> 让阳光照进来（来吧）
> The sunshine in
> 让阳光照进来
> 
> (Oh everyone sing along
> （哦，大家来一起唱
> Come on!)
> 来吧！）
> Now everybody just sing along
> 现在大家只用跟着一起唱
> And let the sunshine on in
> 让阳光照进来
> Open up your heart
> 敞开你的心扉
> And let it shine on you
> 让阳光照耀于你
> 
> And when you're lonely
> 当你感到孤独时
> Hey! let it shine, yea
> 嘿！让它闪耀
> You got to open up your heart
> 你得敞开你的心扉
> And let it shine on in
> 让阳光照耀于你
> 
> When you feel like you've been mistreated
> 当你感到你
> And your friends are turning backs upon you
> 而你的朋友都不再
> Just open up your heart
> 只需敞开你的心扉
> And let it shine in
> 让阳光照进来
> 
> You've got to feel it
> 你得去感受它
> You've got to feel it
> 你得去感受它
> Just open up your heart
> 只需敞开你的心扉
> And let it shine on in
> 让阳光照进来
> 
> (I want you to sing along
> 我想让你和我们一起唱
> I want you to sing along with the 5th Dimension)
> 我想让你与第五维度一起唱
> Just open up your heart
> 只需敞开你的心扉
> And let it shine on in
> 让阳光照进来
[[/collapsible]]

**附录CN-1050-AA1-A2 Aquarius/Let the Sunshine In音乐录像带**
[[collapsible show="+ Aquarius/Let the Sunshine In.avi" hide="-Aquarius/Let the Sunshine In.avi"]]

[[/=]]
----
**文件编号：**SCP-CN-1050-AA1-12

**机密级：**CN-1050/0

**文件类型：**图像/音频

**描述：**SCP-CN-1050-AA1-12是一段时长4分41秒的视频，该文件采集于美国音乐组合The 5th Dimension于1969年释出的《 Aquarius/Let the Sunshine In》音乐录像。该段视频中，五位成员站立在一个白色的平台上随着音乐一边演唱一边舞动，期间镜头围绕着舞台四处转动，在演唱《Aquarius》部分时，视频中央不断显示出各个星座的绘画。
[[/collapsible]]
